Reviews.Title: my friend's father loves it
Reviews.Author: Balaji Pushpanathan
Reviews.Content: i bought this as a gift to my friend father who work in industryhis father used rugby earlier and he was looking for new one, as some problem with rugby after so many years of abnormal usage(like dropping from several floor high, chemical, etc).at first, all were laughing as the phone factor looked uncommon and big, as some kind of hitech scientific device, but once he caught in hand, its lighter than it looks and sturdy, and the phone is nice to work.this is not for normal use person, but defenetly worth to buy for people like my friend's father.so far the quality is above our expectation.

ProductInfo.Features: IP-67 Certified, MILSPEC Certified, Waterproof, Accelerometer-based Man-Down sensor, Lone worker app with GPS tracking, Stereo FM radio, Bluetooth Enabled, GPS
ProductInfo.Name: Sonim Xtreme Performance XP3 Sentinel - Black (Unlocked) Cellular Phone
